Yea, I know it's Saturday night, but I thought I'd start early.

This week we are evaluating Ghosts and Skeletons.

Here's a rehash of the topics for the coming weeks.

1)clerics and archmages

2)proposed new character classes - not promotions or hybrids/dual 
class - each proposed new character gets 3 days before I move on 
unless discussion picks up. I know of at least one new proposed 
character class for this category (Alchemist).

3)orc captains

4)more proposed new character class - promotions of existing classes  
only - each proposed new character gets 3 days before I move on unless 
 discussion picks up.  I know of at least 3 proposed new promoted 
character classes for this category (high priest, asassin, practical 
mage).

5)Game Issues of Health, Potions of Magic, and Mana - yep, we will be 
talking about health and mana of characters for a week. Somehow, it 
will be tied to Hybrid/dual class discussion.

6)3 weeks on hybrid/dual class - we'll just have to wait and see why I 
 want to handle this in 3 parts.

7)Game Issues of Potion of Speed, Speed, and Teleporters

8)Game Issues of Generators

9)Game Issues of Experience Points & Experience Levels

10)Game Issues of Basic Intelligence for characters
